>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.rpaon3jF3nCe5eP9]{Theorem (Ex)}

You can create an area of rapidly growing bacterial mats. Once per day as a standard action, you can use an injection weapon in conjunction with your @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.lgdDuAM2I3s8PQsD]{Custom Microlab} to create a living bacterial wall thatâ€™s 4 inches thick and up to 5 feet long per biohacker level. The wall must be within the first range increment of the injection weapon and can occupy only empty spaces in a contiguous flat plane. The bacterial wall is anchored to any surface it grows on, and each 5-foot square of the bacterial wall has a hardness 1 and 40 Hit Points. Alternatively, you can enclosed a 10-foot by 10-foot space with these walls, as long as the spaces surrounding that space are empty.
